alert.note: Alert for Pinal (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Dust Storm Warning issued July 17 at 7:42PM MST until July 17 at 8:00PM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...A DUST STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 800 PM MST FOR PINAL COUNTY... At 742 PM MST, a wall of dust was along a line extending from Blackwater to near Casa Grande to near Arizola to 6 miles south of Chui-Chu, moving west at 25 mph. HAZARD...Near zero visibility with strong wind in excess of 50 mph. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters. IMPACT...Dangerous life-threatening travel. This includes the following highways... AZ Interstate 10 between mile markers 186 and 204. AZ Interstate 8 between mile markers 164 and 178. AZ Route 87 between mile markers 124 and 142. Locations impacted include... Casa Grande, Coolidge, Arizona City, La Palma, Blackwater, Toltec, Arizola, Randolph, Coolidge Airport and Valley Farms. PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... Dust storms lead to dangerous driving conditions with visibility reduced to near zero. If driving, avoid dust storms if possible. If caught in one, then pull off the road, turn off your lights and keep your foot off the brake.
